mapper.sql: i_User_VisitLog_ID, i_User_VisitLog_UID, i_User_VisitLog_UName, i_User_VisitLog_GuestUID, i_User_VisitLog_IP, i_User_VisitLog_RoomID, i_User_VisitLog_SaleUID, i_User_VisitLog_QQ, i_User_VisitLog_Note, i_User_VisitLog_Time, i_User_VisitLog_LeaveTime, i_User_VisitLog_FromSite, i_User_VisitLog_FromSiteCode, i_User_VisitLog_FromUrl, i_User_VisitLog_FromKey, i_User_VisitLog_CurrentSite, i_User_VisitLog_CurrentUrl, i_User_VisitLog_IsMobile, i_User_VisitLog_IsIos, i_User_VisitLog_IsAndroid, i_User_VisitLog_Pa, i_User_VisitLog_Pl, i_User_VisitLog_Ch,
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO i_User_VisitLog ( i_User_VisitLog_ID , i_User_VisitLog_UID , i_User_VisitLog_UName , i_User_VisitLog_GuestUID , i_User_VisitLog_IP , i_User_VisitLog_RoomID , i_User_VisitLog_SaleUID , i_User_VisitLog_QQ , i_User_VisitLog_Note , i_User_VisitLog_Time , i_User_VisitLog_LeaveTime , i_User_VisitLog_FromSite , i_User_VisitLog_FromSiteCode , i_User_VisitLog_FromUrl , i_User_VisitLog_FromKey , i_User_VisitLog_CurrentSite , i_User_VisitLog_CurrentUrl , i_User_VisitLog_IsMobile , i_User_VisitLog_IsIos , i_User_VisitLog_IsAndroid , i_User_VisitLog_Pa , i_User_VisitLog_Pl , i_User_VisitLog_Ch ) VALUES ( #{iUserVisitlogId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{iUserVisitlogUid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{iUserVisitlogUname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iUserVisitlogGuestuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iUserVisitlogIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iUserVisitlogRoomid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{iUserVisitlogSaleuid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{iUserVisitlogQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iUserVisitlogNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iUserVisitlogTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{iUserVisitlogLeavetime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{iUserVisitlogFromsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iUserVisitlogFromsitecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iUserVisitlogFromurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iUserVisitlogFromkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iUserVisitlogCurrentsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iUserVisitlogCurrenturl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iUserVisitlogIsmobile,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{iUserVisitlogIsios,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{iUserVisitlogIsandroid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{iUserVisitlogPa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iUserVisitlogPl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iUserVisitlogCh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT i_User_VisitLog_ID as "iUserVisitlogId" , i_User_VisitLog_UID as "iUserVisitlogUid" , i_User_VisitLog_UName as "iUserVisitlogUname" , i_User_VisitLog_GuestUID as "iUserVisitlogGuestuid" , i_User_VisitLog_IP as "iUserVisitlogIp" , i_User_VisitLog_RoomID as "iUserVisitlogRoomid" , i_User_VisitLog_SaleUID as "iUserVisitlogSaleuid" , i_User_VisitLog_QQ as "iUserVisitlogQq" , i_User_VisitLog_Note as "iUserVisitlogNote" , i_User_VisitLog_Time as "iUserVisitlogTime" , i_User_VisitLog_LeaveTime as "iUserVisitlogLeavetime" , i_User_VisitLog_FromSite as "iUserVisitlogFromsite" , i_User_VisitLog_FromSiteCode as "iUserVisitlogFromsitecode" , i_User_VisitLog_FromUrl as "iUserVisitlogFromurl" , i_User_VisitLog_FromKey as "iUserVisitlogFromkey" , i_User_VisitLog_CurrentSite as "iUserVisitlogCurrentsite" , i_User_VisitLog_CurrentUrl as "iUserVisitlogCurrenturl" , i_User_VisitLog_IsMobile as "iUserVisitlogIsmobile" , i_User_VisitLog_IsIos as "iUserVisitlogIsios" , i_User_VisitLog_IsAndroid as "iUserVisitlogIsandroid" , i_User_VisitLog_Pa as "iUserVisitlogPa" , i_User_VisitLog_Pl as "iUserVisitlogPl" , i_User_VisitLog_Ch as "iUserVisitlogCh" FROM i_User_VisitLog WHERE i_User_VisitLog_ID=#{iUserVisitlogId}
SELECT Auto_increment FROM information_schema.`TABLES` WHERE Table_Schema='${dbName}' AND table_name = 'i_User_VisitLog'
